about_the_game:
It contains vertical-scrolling rhythm gameplay which is most notably found in games like Guitar Hero, but in multiplayer. But that's not all that it offers!
There is the Edoren System which spices things up by allowing you to do special attacks, making each round slightly different from the previous.

You can choose between a distinct cast of anime characters ranging from the stoic half-spider "KneoX" to the calm violinist "Shiroko", each with their own variety of special moves giving the rhythm gameplay a strategic twist!

You can also make your own custom song charts and play them with your friends! (you're gonna have to buy the Legion DLC first though)

The Features Of Rhythm Brawl :-

  • Vertical Scrolling Rhythm Gameplay.
  • 2-5 Minute Long Battles.
  • Local Multiplayer.
  • AI Battles.
  • 6 characters, each with their own playstyle.
  • Many different songs from different music genres.
  • Edoren System for strategy.

highlighted.name: "As you can see live, now on Rhythm Brawl"

detailed_description:
It contains vertical-scrolling rhythm gameplay which is most notably found in games like Guitar Hero, but in multiplayer. But that's not all that it offers!
There is the Edoren System which spices things up by allowing you to do special attacks, making each round slightly different from the previous.

You can choose between a distinct cast of anime characters ranging from the stoic half-spider "KneoX" to the calm violinist "Shiroko", each with their own variety of special moves giving the rhythm gameplay a strategic twist!

You can also make your own custom song charts and play them with your friends! (you're gonna have to buy the Legion DLC first though)

The Features Of Rhythm Brawl :-

  • Vertical Scrolling Rhythm Gameplay.
  • 2-5 Minute Long Battles.
  • Local Multiplayer.
  • AI Battles.
  • 6 characters, each with their own playstyle.
  • Many different songs from different music genres.
  • Edoren System for strategy.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any Distro (64 bit)
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated GPU
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL ES2 required at minimum
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Any Distro (64 bit)
  • Processor: Core i5 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL ES3 recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X or higher
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated GPU
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL ES2 required at minimum
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X or higher

name: Rhythm Brawl

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL ES2 required at minimum
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL ES3 recommended

short_description: Compete against your friend in a battle of music! Battle to the beat as a character of your choosing to see who becomes "The King of Rhythm". Will you be the King? Play and Find out!
